resources:
P4_Cities_JavierVictorGloria
Rotterdam Netherlands Algeciras Spain Oran Algeria Santos Brazil Hong Kong
China Europe Africa South America Asia
Markthal An iconic indoor market with a giant mural and fresh food stalls.
Cube Houses Innovative 45-degree tilted homes designed by Piet Blom.
Erasmus Bridge Stunning cable-stayed bridge known as "The Swan".
Euromast Observation tower with the best panoramic views of the city.
Rotterdam Zoo One of the oldest and most beautiful zoos in the Netherlands.
Getares Beach Beach famous for its views of the Strait and family-friendly atmosphere.
High Square The heart of the city, decorated with typical Andalusian tiles.
Maria Cristina Park An oasis of tranquility with historic gardens in the center.
Port of Algeciras One of the most important commercial ports in Europe.
Abastos Market Engineering masterpiece by Eduardo Torroja.
Fort of Santa Cruz Historic fort with spectacular views of the port and city.
Hassan Pasha Mosque An architectural gem from the Ottoman period.
Sacred Heart Cathedral Old cathedral converted into a library in Byzantine style.
Front de Mer Seaside promenade perfect for walks and enjoying the sea breeze.
Bey\'s Palace Historic residence showcasing the elegance of Islamic art.
Coffee Museum Located in the old Coffee Exchange, narrating the history of the bean in Brazil.
Beach Gardens The longest beach front garden in the world according to Guinness.
Mount Serrat Take a funicular to see the entire city and the port of Santos.
Vila Belmiro Stadium The legendary field where Pelé made history with Santos FC.
Santos Aquarium The first municipal aquarium in Brazil with hundreds of species.
Victoria Peak The highest point on the island with incredible views of the skyscrapers.
Tian Tan Buddha Giant bronze statue located in the Lantau Mountains.
Star Ferry Cross Victoria Harbour on this historic and affordable boat.
Temple Street Night Market Vibrant night market with street food and souvenirs.
Avenue of Stars Homage to Hong Kong cinema with statues like Bruce Lee\'s.
